message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your turn to be reasonable.  I'll take a little less than half to end this quickly.
I can do 58-42, it's as low as I'm willing to go for now.
The clock is ticking.  Meet me in the middle or this will get much worse for both of us.
I'll meet you closer to the middle, but I still think I deserve a bit more.
This is ridiculous.  We're losing a fortune!  Let's just split it evenly and go home.
